name: Goose Typing Attack
description:
Game made for Ludumdare 41 (Combine 2 Incompatible Genres)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/goose-typing-attack

A typing auto-runner game featuring a Goose! Get that human!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Type correctly to get closer.  Miss a word and lose speed.

TIP: If you are stuck with a word, 'Backspace' will reset the word.

Web game uses WebGL,  works in chrome and firefox only!

#ldjam #ludumdare
